content: add a touch of handmade charm to your space with this easy and versatile tiny pumpkin garland crochet pattern whether you re decorating a living room brightening up a party or just adding a splash of whimsy to your home this pattern is the perfect quick fall project skill level beginner-friendly yarn any weight yarn can be used from delicate lace to chunky and bold the sample was made using bulky yarn for a plush eye-catching look hook size use the recommended hook size for your chosen yarn this listing includes step-by-step written instructions to create the pumpkins stems and garland strand digital pdf format for instant download each pumpkin works up quickly and can be used individually or strung together to create garlands of any length perfect for stash-busting and creative gift giving connect with us website thecraftymaritimer ca instagram @thecraftymaritimer facebook the crafty maritimer email thecraftymaritimer@gmail com ravelry michellemeier
